title: Season 7 Placement Results
body: Why am I being placed into Bronze 1 when my MMR should be significantly higher? I understand that I will be starting lower but this doesn't seem right as I am ending the season in Diamond 4.

replies.body: I think that notification is misleading, and may have been intended for a rank team for Season 6.  The new season hasn't started, and we're still a bit away from that so nobody is getting placed.  Hope that helps clear things up!
why did i get put in bronze 5 when i won 4 out of 10 of my ranked games and other people in bronze 1 had the same amount of wins as me, some have even lower

If you ended diamond 4 in solo/duo queue, don't worry then as it's flex queue. Check your profile, you should see that bronze 1 crest in "flex 5v5" (previously it was "Ranked 5v5") while your solo/duo is still diamond 4 i assume. all players, even challengers, no matter how much placement matches they won, if they were challenger I on solo/duo queue, in flex 5v5 ( which is only possible ranked option ATM) they will be scattered around bronze - platinum. Peace {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
Wait those 10 rankeds for 5v5 mode are for the new season placements?
